
All steps done in `tmp/id-mario` folder using compiled `simple_id_client`;

```
git clone git@gitlab.com:Concordium/crypto.git
cd crypto/rust-src/simple_id_client
cargo build --release
cp ../target/release/simple_id_client ~/.local/bin
```


### Setup: Generate global files

```
# Creates database/identity_providers.json and database/identity_provider_N.json files
simple_id_client generate-ips
# Creates database/global.json
simple_id_client generate-global
```

### User: Create CHI (Credential Holder Information)

```
simple_id_client create-chi --out mario-chi.json
```

### User: Create ACI (Account Creation Information) & PIO (Pre-Identity Object).

Add to database/identity_providers.json:

```
[
  {
    "arElgamalGenerator": "97f1d3a73197d7942695638c4fa9ac0fc3688c4f9774b905a14e3a3f171bac586c55e83ff97a1aeffb3af00adb22c6bb",
    "arName": "anonymity_revoker-5",
    "arPublicKey": "b22fa02ecffcc731160a5d1892651aa0aeca76f7cf227fb8b749c8389d09ff67fdccadd1ca67137df93200323a620db7",
    "ipIdentity": "identity_provider-5",
    "ipVerifyKey": ""
  }
]
```

```
simple_id_client start-ip --chi mario-chi.json --private mario-aci.json --public mario-pio.json
```

### Issuer: Create signed Identity Object

Paste into `database/identity_provider-5.json`

```
{
  "idPrivateKey": "",
  "publicIdInfo": {
    "arElgamalGenerator": "97f1d3a73197d7942695638c4fa9ac0fc3688c4f9774b905a14e3a3f171bac586c55e83ff97a1aeffb3af00adb22c6bb",
    "arName": "anonymity_revoker-5",
    "arPublicKey": "b22fa02ecffcc731160a5d1892651aa0aeca76f7cf227fb8b749c8389d09ff67fdccadd1ca67137df93200323a620db7",
    "ipIdentity": "identity_provider-5",
    "ipVerifyKey": ""
  }
}
```

Then sign the PIO.

```
simple_id_client ip-sign-pio --pio mario-pio.json --ip-data database/identity_provider-5.json --out mario-spio.json
```

### User: Deployment of credentials onto the chain

```
simple_id_client deploy-credential --id-object mario-identity-object.json --private mario-aci.json --bin-out credential-transaction-payload.bin --out credential.json
```
